reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress comfortable and flattering, noting it hugs their curves and fits well over a bump. The dress is soft, stretchy, and long enough to cover toes, making it suitable for tall women. While some it's non-see through, others find it somewhat see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: Wore this dress for my pregnancy announcement photos and absolutely loved it. Received many compliments on the fit of the dress. Fabric is soft, stretchy, comfortable and not see through whatsoever. It is form fitting throughout the top half, so bra choice is important Read more
items.author: Skye Nicole Wellman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fit!
items.body: Hugs your body in all the right places. Warm, color is spot on! The quality is great & not see through! The size was perfect I’m 5 ft 3in & and 123lbs. Great buy! Read more
items.author: Tanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy for spoon, pear and hour glass shapes.
items.body: Super sexy! I’m 5’2 and around 125-28. 33” bust 26-27” waist and 36.5-37 hips. XS was the best. I bought both sizes and the small was good but the xs was BOMBBB. soft ribbed fabric. Not see through. Got lots of compliments. I do wish they had this with a slit. My friend was awesome and was able to sew a slit for me! Game changer even more. Not crazy too long. Was nice with 4” platform nude heels. Made it off the floor. Read more
items.author: cynthia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase!
items.body: Super cute dress, material is comfortable, thick, and not even remotely see through. It also fits throughout pregnancy! I have a large bust and if pulled up enough it is still modest and doesn’t show your boobs, or you can have it pulled down more for the opposite! Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Sz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THE QUALITY OF THE FABRIC
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: It hugs my body in all the right places and the material is very soft and stretchy I bought a Medium and i weigh 140 lbs 5"2. This is def the perfect maxi dress for a bargain. Read more
items.author: Nandy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Baby Shower Dress
items.body: Great dress for maternity. Very stretchy, comfortable fabric. I bought no show underwear to go under to reduce lines. I’m wearing a size medium at 32 weeks pregnant and 200 lbs. Read more
items.author: Makayla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must buy!!
items.body: So happy with my purchase!! Fit perfectly and was long enough. I’m 5’11 and 170 lbs and this was the perfect dress for Thanksgiving. I will be buying more colors. Read more
items.author: Alayja

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Found My Fall Season Dress
items.body: I really love the fabric on this dress. It feels very comfortable and soft. The length is perfect. It is durable for multiple occasions. You can dress it down. Wear flat shoes or dress it up with high heels. The fabric is warm and not see through. Love is color brown. I want different colors in this dress. Read more
items.author: Princess TD Alexander

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Khaki, Blue, Burgundy, Olive Green, Black, Coffee, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
